programme.title: Blood & Treasure S2
programme.desc: Danny, Lexi and Violet travel across a dangerous chemical wasteland in Kazakhstan to an abandoned bio-weapons facility. Meanwhile, Chuck begins his investigation about how the Vatican and the Spirit Banner are connected.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: All Stars
programme.desc: AGT: All-Stars is an expansion of the original AGT that features "fan favorites, finalists, viral sensations" and even winners of past AGT seasons. The upcoming show could even include acts from other versions of AGT around the world, bringing some fresh new faces to an already excited fan base.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S41
programme.desc: Pat Sajak hosts his final season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: Deadline To Disaster
programme.desc: This thrilling series puts viewers in the eye of the storm of Hurricanes Katrina, Michael and Dorian, as well as the shocking 2019 tornado outbreak in Iowa, the devastating flash floods in Ellicott City and Texas, and more.

programme.title: Monster Jam S2
programme.desc: Professional monster truck drivers compete against each other in races and freestyle competitions around the world to win the top prize.

programme.title: Wipeout USA S8
programme.desc: Follows the three rounds and three-stage, obstacle course consisting of multiple strategy and decision points designed to further challenge, and wear out, the stamina of the competitors. Hosted by John Cena, Nicole Byer, and Camille Kostek.

programme.title: Wipeout USA S8
programme.desc: Follows the three rounds and three-stage, obstacle course consisting of multiple strategy and decision points designed to further challenge, and wear out, the stamina of the competitors. Hosted by John Cena, Nicole Byer, and Camille Kostek.

programme.title: Hiccup & Sneeze
programme.desc: Being forest monsters, Hiccup and Sneeze don't know what a beach is. Eventually they learn about the beach and the sea and decide to transform the living room into their very own seaside paradise, much to Bibi's surprise.

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C S2
programme.desc: Dressing up is fun! Miss P wants to show the agents how they can have fun by dressing up and pretending to be someone else. She turns Sham into a chef , Didi into a butterfly and Ling becomes a milk maid! THE BIG WORD i s 'masquerade' and the smaller words are see, mud and read.

programme.title: Watch Eat! S2
programme.desc: With a crisp $10 note, 3 Watch Eat teams consisting of parents and kids sweep through a supermarket to select food to keep the fats away. Mama Miranda then teaches the kids to make a mouth-watering dessert with granola, yogurt and sliced plums, peaches and kiwi fruits. Aptly called Keeping Lean, see how the kids struggle to complete this dish in 1 minute.

programme.title: Safari Bus Tayo
programme.desc: Safari bus Tayo and a little explorer Duri go on an adventure on a safari in Africa. Let's meet animals on the safari!

programme.title: Safari Bus Tayo
programme.desc: Safari bus Tayo and a little explorer Duri go on an adventure on a safari in Africa. Let's meet animals on the safari!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Dinoman S2
programme.desc: Dino Man and his friends are always ready to answer the call for help from other dinosaurs in Dino World!

programme.title: Ok-to Try
programme.desc: How will you react when you bite into a piece of fried chicken that is actually ice-cream? In this episode, our Try-ers check out strange foods and try to make one of their own!

programme.title: Metal Cardbot S1
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) A long time ago, there was a planet named Machina where a race of sentient machines, or Metal Cardbots, resided. One day, the planet suddenly explodes, forcing its inhabitants to live on Earth. To not attract attention, the Cardbots disguise themselves as everyday vehicles. In the present day, Jun, an elementary school kid who loves BMX, accidentally discovers the Metal Breath, a wrist gadget that allows him to capture and power up the Cardbots with differe.

programme.title: Mondo Yan
programme.desc: The world has fallen into chaos and is now a stinky land of toxic cesspools and monstrous mutants, called the Chou World, run by the nasty villain Negu. High above, on top of ancient abandoned skyscrapers, a beautiful new yet fragile and harmonious world has risen: the Yan World. Protected by three eccentric Elders, three young apprentice misfits have been chosen to learn their secrets and protect this peaceful and idyllic place!

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S4
programme.desc: Astrid needs help assembling the 3 stage rocket for her crater alien friend as he needs to go home. Can the team help get the alien home? Astrid needs help making duplicates of toys for Cosmo's dog play party. Can the team help create enough doubles? Or will Cosmo create a mess?

programme.title: Bakugan 3.1
programme.desc: The Bakugan brawlers are back with new Bakugan buddies! Watch out for an all new origin story.

programme.title: Totally Spies S2
programme.desc: Three teenage girls from Beverly Hills attempt to balance their lives as high school (later university) students with their undercover work as super-spies, battling an array of bizarre criminals!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S13
programme.desc: The misadventures of a talking sea sponge who works at a fast food restaurant, attends a boating school, and lives in an underwater pineapple.

programme.title: Oddbods: Party Monsters
programme.desc: Jeff's party guests are transformed into their scary alter egos by a magician, and it's up to Slick to use his Sherlock Holmes costume and solve the case.

programme.title: Johnny Test S4
programme.desc: The adventures of average suburban boy Johnny Test, who wittingly plays test subject for his genius twin sisters' various experiments, reluctantly fighting evil villains in the process.

programme.title: The Deep S4
programme.desc: Ant and Fontaine rescue a Polar Bear from the middle of the ocean. When they bring it on board, they realize she's close to giving birth! Can the Nektons move her to a safer place in time?

programme.title: Miniforce: Super Dino Power [S3]
programme.desc: The peace in Blue City is disturbed by the new villain, the Captain Powerman! Our Miniforce must stop Powerman from punishing people who treated those "daily stuff" harshly. With their brand-new Super Dino Power, Miniforce transforms into dino rangers!

programme.title: Groom My Room Sr 6
programme.desc: In Groom My Room, catch kids as they take charge and make their dream bedrooms a reality! Each week, one lucky kid gets to transform their room from bland to grand!

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Makan Time Stories S2
programme.desc: In the new season of Makan Time Stories, Chef-Historian Chris Choo and actor Rayve Tay meet more diverse and exciting personalities in Singapore to uncover inspiring stories of community and integration.

programme.title: Work.Able
programme.desc: Unable to get a job for two years, Donnervan enrols into MIJ in the hope of finding where his real interests lie. Graduate Faiz is on the lookout for a new job after several part-time gigs.

programme.title: World's Most Luxurious
programme.desc: Following luxury estate-agent-to-the-stars Shawn in Los Angeles, where he is on the hunt for a home for a mystery billionaire - and only the best is good enough. Ocean view home owner Liz is selling her $35m cliff-top mansion, while over in Beverly Hills, Freedom is revamping his $10 million pad, decking it out in designer gear in the hope of making more than a million in profit.

programme.title: Don't Forget the Lyrics USA S6
programme.desc: The hit music game show is back! Just like in the original version, one contestant must attempt to sing through and fill in the missing lyrics to TEN of the biggest hit songs of all time! But when the music stops, the contestant must correctly provide the missing song lyrics. If a contestant can successfully make it through the first 9 songs without missing a SINGLE lyric, they'll have the chance to play a 10th and final song for a shot at ONE MILLION DOLLARS!

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S23
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: Cassandra Webb is a New York City paramedic who starts to show signs of clairvoyance. Forced to confront revelations about her past, she must protect three young women from a mysterious adversary who wants them dead.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Earth's Great River S2
programme.desc: Travel along three more of the planet's most spectacular rivers: the Danube, the Yukon and the Zambezi. In Europe, find out how the Danube, is coping with years of human impact. Visit North America's Yukon and see the rich variety of life that has made this great frozen river home, from musk ox to bears. And in Africa, explore the length of the Zambezi, from a tiny trickle deep in a forest to the thundering Victoria Falls, and meet the hippos, elephants, lions and buffalo drawn to its wild water.

programme.title: My Fair Lady
programme.desc: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures
programme.desc: In his latest set of adventures, Andy travels to all corners of the globe, meeting an amazing new cast of animals - from chameleons in Sri Lanka to emperor penguins in Antarctica. Accompanied by tech wizard Jen and new information-seeking AI Scout, Andy travels the globe in a hi-tech expedition truck, a scientific research station that houses Jen's database of incredible facts about fauna and flora that inhabit our planet. In each episode, the team are sent on a mission by HQ to solve a puzzle.

programme.title: Zero Hero
programme.desc: A weekly half hour series revolving around a Singaporean superhero family, The Magnificent Heroes, who have mysteriously lost all their super powers and now struggle to be like the average human being. Facing daily problems of homework, rudeness, pollution, office politics, busybody neighbours, bullying, peer pressure, relationships, the list is endless. Every week, a super villain from their past resurfaces, and it's up to our superheroes with no super powers to foil them.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: I'm Singaporean showcases talented Singaporeans excelling abroad. From baseball to classical music to flamenco, their inspiring stories reveal passion, resilience, and global success.

programme.title: Stars In Style S8
programme.desc: Stars in Style cover all the important looks and shapes from the biggest celebs. The hottest trends in fashion, beauty and lifestyle with expert tips and opinions.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Zaryf puts his job on the line when he confronts Dr Shen about his relationship with Syirah. James' worry about Ananya intensifies when he comes across a brain tumour support brochure in her office.

programme.title: Freshly Picked With Simon Toohey S2
programme.desc: On today's episode, Simon heads to tropical Queensland, tasting unique fruit and turning it into an easy breakfast. We zero in on Blayne Bertoncello's Zero Waste Roast Pumpkin, then get in with all the colours of Simon's rainbow slaw.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S1
programme.desc: In each episode, Adam Liaw is joined by 2 special guests - a combination of celebrity chefs, cooks and well-known personalities - and together they cook up a variety of dishes that centre around a nightly theme. They cook together sharing their knowledge, tips and tricks of the trade, for viewers to watch and follow their recipes at home. The Cook Up showcases all your favourite chefs, celebrities, culture, food and fun.

programme.title: America's Got Talent S18
programme.desc: With an astronomical number of loyal fans eager to find out what's in store, judges Simon Cowell, Howie Mandel, Heidi Klum and Sofia Vergara - and host Terry Crews - are back with more diverse talent and show-stopping moments than ever before. With contestants of all backgrounds and ages competing for the life-changing, million dollar prize, we follow the hopeful performers, from singers and dancers to comedians, magicians and more, on their incredible journeys.

programme.title: 苍兰诀
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面) 该剧主要讲述了傲娇月尊东方青苍和软萌小仙女小兰花之间的虐恋故事。魄心族神女被月尊东方青苍灭族，万年后重生成天界低阶仙女,小兰花无意间复活了困于昊天塔的灭族仇人。为获得自由，东方青苍要牺牲小兰花的神女之魂解开身上咒术封印，在此过程中，断情绝爱的东方青苍却爱上了温顺可爱的小兰花。.

programme.title: 老友万岁

programme.title: 老友万岁
programme.desc: (PG) 丽娥决定入住千岁之家，让欣欣带她巡视环境，欣欣无奈。丽娥和淑梅相见欢，最后决定入住四人房。随后丽娥也和Philip打成一片，不仅爆出自己过去的婚史，还当着大家的面调戏俊阳，让欣欣无地自容。.

programme.title: 阿贤这么吃 S2
programme.desc: 《阿贤这么吃2 》走入庄园探寻马来西亚产制优质食材，看看各路生产者如何深耕在地物产，从咖啡、牛奶、鱼肉、蔬菜、鸡肉、发酵物到食用菌菇，还有我们刻板印象中唯有欧洲产才属优质品的起司、无花果、鱼子酱与巧克力等等，都将全然是马来西亚在地风土孕育的物产。阿贤也请教餐厅主厨如何将多元多样的风土食材，烹制成日常餐桌上的美味风景线，让土地与餐桌产生紧密连结，且透过不停梳理、复刻与重现，形塑马来西亚饮食的新在地。.

programme.title: 空中访民情 2024
programme.desc: 人力部长陈诗龙医生是不折不扣的吃货！《空中访民情2024》第四集，他和主持人白薇秀一路吃到底。不过，他小时候因为家境贫困而吃得朴素。经一番努力当上医生，他却治不了父母的重病而感到遗憾。他的经历如何影响他的人生观？如今，工作人士都希望有良好的工作机会和照顾家人的时间，他希望通过政策如何帮助国人？.

programme.title: 爱不虚拟

programme.title: 好睡好起
programme.desc: (PG)《好睡好起》，颠覆大家对睡眠世界的想像，全城启动睡眠模式！家家有本难「睡」的经，「数绵羊」有科学根据？ 「睡眠债」怎样还？走进睡眠实验室，嘉宾「瞓身」参与，一觉醒来，有何惊人发现？人人会睡，但未必个个睡得好，想睡得好，要从睡前做起。从今天开始，大家《好睡好起》！.

programme.title: 长风渡
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面) 顾九思想不到柳玉茹那么厉害的一个人，也有担心紧张的时候。于是，顾九思给柳玉茹留下锦囊妙计，对顾家掌柜逐个击破，竟一一奏效。柳玉茹对待这笔生意十分上心，她亲自选品，在徉州街头奔走，四处比价。带来的样品让周烨十分满意，她与周烨约定好了相见时间。然而签约当天却恒生变故，周烨告诉柳玉茹，有一个叫洛子商的商人也给他送来了样品，货款比顾家低两成半，交货时间却还早了一个月。.

programme.title: 御赐小仵作
programme.desc: (PG-些许暴力画面) 讲述了唐中晚期，来自西南山区仵作世家的少女楚楚，为实现梦想独自来长安闯荡，参加仵作考试，遇到断案如神的安郡王萧瑾瑜。萧瑾瑜召集楚楚、景翊、冷月等人作为搭档揭秘探案。伴随着一个个的案件破解，团队一步步揭开谜底，最终破解了一场延续十八年的惊天大案的故事。.

programme.title: 台湾原味道
programme.desc: 《原味道》系列再次登陆台湾，由当地新生代主持韦汝、梁凯晴、朱佑宏接棒，带着在台湾生活多年的香港小清新谭凯萤，以独特观点搜罗台湾的在地好味道！从宝岛海之味，一路到山林间的原住民风味，再细味客家、闽南等不同族群餐桌上的美味，追味寻源了解背后的故事，让大家更深入认识台湾原味道！.
